name: Kaiju Simulator
description:
Demolish a small world that made you a monster
...Kaiju?

Kaiju eiga, Japanese for big-monster movies, feature bipedal monsters attacking cities, crushing vehicles, and tearing down buildings. 

Be Godzilla™- or King Kong™-sized

Destroy the elite plutocracy sponsoring the unethical gain-of-function experiments that made you monstrously big.

TAKE CONTROL of a vengeance-seeking colossus in our virtual reality experience.

-- ATTACK THE CITY AS A GIANT MONSTER

Express your disdain for corporate control and demand culpability: Holding unethical institutions to account has never felt so tangible and satisfying.

Rip the totalitarian institutions behind your mutation right out of the ground...

--  GRABBABLE:  HURL BUILDINGS AT MILITARY CHOPPERS

Recreate scenes from the Giant Monster Attack genre's most iconic moments. Evade missiles from helicopters that intelligently track your every move

Use the city to mount your defense against a greedy military-industrial complex.

-- CONFRONT WEALTH INEQUALITY:  EAT THE RICH 

Greedy fat cats bankrolled the profligate gain-of-function research behind your titanic size. 

Rip the roof off and reach out to demand satisfaction from bad actors.

Eat him! 

...Or use him as a projectile to destroy the helicopters right out of the air. 

All the agency lies with you! --

A collaboration between Aerton (@aertoncastro) and Arjan S. (@arjanthegreat)
